sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { ForecastContext } from "./context/ForecastContext"; function Today() { const { city, resArray, weatherData, dayName } = useContext(ForecastContext); return (
{dayName}
6 Oct
{city}
Max: {weatherData} - Min: {weatherData} oC
20% 18km/h East
); } export default Today;
